snippet.title: Worlds of Aria - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into an adventure playable solo or as a group, inspired by tabletop role-playing games. Collaboration, betrayal, arguments… What type of adventurer will you and your companions be in Worlds of Aria?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1866980/Worlds_of_Aria/

Worlds of Aria will release on PC (Steam) and Nintendo Switch in Early 2024.

Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/WorldsofAria
https://twitter.com/ishtar_games

Discord: 
https://discord.com/invite/QumwzBy4nx
